caption.title: The upper Indus basin.
caption.p: The map shows the main rivers, mountain ranges, digital elevation model [ 18] and locations of the main dams. Numbered red dots indicate stream flow locations referred to in other figures. Source of the background hillshade is www.naturalearthdata.com. Source of political borders displayed in the inset is the GADM database of Global Administrative Areas ( www.gadm.org).
